codes.RT11: Type is an enquiry on the bank's position.
codes.RT12: Type is an enquiry on a specific transaction.
codes.RT13: Type is an enquiry on a queued transaction.
codes.RT14: Type is an enquiry on a suspicious transaction.
codes.RT15: Type is an enquiry on pending inward credits.
codes.RT16: Type is an enquiry on the system date and/or time.

description: Specifies the external request type code for the enquiry on a position in the format of character string with a maximum length of 4 characters.
name: ExternalEnquiryRequestType1Code
